title: Low Interest Rates and the Financial System
content: Note:  PCE is personal consumption expenditures.  Source: Haver Analytics; Congressional Budget Office (CBO).   -4  -2  0  2  4  6  8  10  1960 1965 1970 1975 1980 1985 1990 1995 2000 2005 2010 2015  Figure 1:  U.S. Unemployment and Inflation Gaps Percent  Inflation Gap (year-over-year core PCE  relative to 2%  target)  Unemployment Gap (relative to CBO natural rate of unemployment)  PercentPercent
